languages.text: На мостике, как и прежде, кипит жизнь — пускай людей и окружают следы разрушений. Старшие офицеры взяли ситуацию под контроль и организовали людей — аварийная команда уже закончила ремонт труб, техноматы настраивают когитаторы и консоли, а лекари пакуют немногочисленные трупы и осматривают раненых.

traits.locale_text: На мостике, как и прежде, кипит жизнь. Старшие офицеры взяли ситуацию под контроль и организовали людей — аварийная команда уже закончила ремонт труб и выкачку ядовитого газа, техники настраивают когитаторы и панели управления, а медики пакуют немногочисленные трупы и осматривают раненых.

languages.text: Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.
languages.original_text: На мостике, как и прежде, кипит жизнь — пускай людей и окружают следы разрушений. Старшие офицеры взяли ситуацию под контроль и организовали людей — аварийная команда уже закончила ремонт труб, техноматы настраивают когитаторы и консоли, а лекари пакуют немногочисленные трупы и осматривают раненых.

traits.locale_text: Life at the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. Senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organized — the emergency crew has already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are packing what few corpses there are and inspecting the wounded.

Life at the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. Senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organized — the emergency crew has already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are packing what few corpses there are and inspecting the wounded.

Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

languages.text: El puente es tan bullicioso como de costumbre, a pesar de la destrucción que rodea a los tripulantes. Los oficiales superiores tienen controlada la situación y la gente está organizada: el equipo de emergencia ya ha reparado las tuberías, los tecnómatas están preparando consolas y cogitadores y el personal médico está retirando los cadáveres y atendiendo a los heridos.
languages.original_text: Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

traits.locale_text: El puente es tan bullicioso como de costumbre, a pesar de la destrucción que rodea a los tripulantes. Los oficiales superiores tienen controlada la situación y la gente está organizada: el equipo de emergencia ya ha reparado las tuberías, los tecnómatas están preparando consolas y cogitadores y el personal médico está retirando los cadáveres y atendiendo a los heridos.

languages.text: 尽管舰船各处都遭受了损害，但舰桥上的气氛和以往一样忙碌。高阶军官已经控制住了局势，船员们也被组织了起来。应急团队已经修好了管道，技工们正在设置沉思者与控制台，而医护人员也在把为数不多的尸体装进袋子里，检查伤员的情况。
languages.original_text: Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

traits.locale_text: 尽管舰船各处都遭受了损害，但舰桥上的气氛和以往一样忙碌。高阶军官已经控制住了局势，船员们也被组织了起来。应急团队已经修好了管道，机械殉道者们正在设置思考器与控制台，而医护人员也在把为数不多的尸体装进袋子里，检查伤员的情况。

languages.text: 周りはあちこちメチャクチャだというのに、ブリッジの上の生活は相変わらず賑やかだ。上級士官達は状況をコントロールしており、人々はまとまっている。救急クルーはすでにパイプの修理を終え、テクノマットは考算機とコンソールを設定していた。治療士は数少ない死体を袋に詰め、負傷者の傷を診ている。
languages.original_text: Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

traits.locale_text: 周りはあちこちメチャクチャだというのに、ブリッジの上の生活は相変わらず賑やかだ。上級士官達は状況をコントロールしており、人々はまとまっている。救急クルーはすでにパイプの修理を終え、テクノマットは考算機とコンソールを設定していた。治療士は数少ない死体を袋に詰め、負傷者の傷を診ている。

languages.text: Das Leben auf der Brücke ist geschäftig wie eh und je – auch wenn die Menschen von Zerstörung umgeben sind. Die Führungsoffiziere haben die Situation unter Kontrolle, und die Menschen haben sich organisiert – die Notfallcrew hat die Reparatur der Rohre bereits abgeschlossen, die Technomaten bauen Cogitatoren und Konsolen auf, und die Heiler sammeln die wenigen Leichen ein und untersuchen die Verwundeten.
languages.original_text: Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

languages.text: Malgré la destruction qu'il a subie, le pont est aussi animé que d'ordinaire. Les officiers supérieurs ont la situation bien en main et se sont chargés d'organiser leurs subalternes : l'équipe d'urgence a déjà terminé de réparer les tuyaux, les technomates relancent les cogitateurs et les consoles, et les soigneurs mettent les quelques cadavres dans des sacs ou examinent les blessés.
languages.original_text: Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

traits.locale_text: Malgré la destruction qu'il a subie, le pont est aussi animé que d'ordinaire. Les officiers supérieurs ont la situation bien en main et se sont chargés d'organiser leurs subalternes : l'équipe d'urgence a déjà terminé de réparer les tuyaux, les technomates relancent les cogitateurs et les consoles, et les soigneurs mettent les quelques cadavres dans des sacs ou examinent les blessés.

languages.text: Her yerde yıkımın izleri olsa da köprüde hayat, her zamanki gibi hareketli. Üst düzey subaylar durumu kontrol altına almış, insanlar organize edilmiş. Boruların onarımı acil durum ekiplerince çoktan tamamlanmış. Teknomatlar, kavramsayar ve konsolları kuruyor; şifacılar da az sayıda cesedi toplayıp yaralıları inceliyor.
languages.original_text: Life on the bridge is as bustling as ever — even though the people are surrounded by destruction. The senior officers have the situation under control, and the people have been organised — the emergency crew have already finished repairing the pipes, the technomats are setting up cogitators and consoles, and the healers are bagging up what few corpses there are and examining the wounded.

traits.locale_text: Her yerde yıkımın izleri olsa da köprüdeki hayat her zamanki gibi hareketli. Üst düzey subaylar durumu kontrol altına aldı, insanlar organize edildi. Acil durum ekibi boruların onarımını çoktan tamamladı; teknomatonlar, kavramsayarlar ile konsollar kuruyor; şifacılar da az sayıda cesedi toplayıp yaralıları inceliyor.
